hard-questions_key2:
Two times a number, decreased by 12 equals three times the number, decreased by 15. Which is the number?

     a) 2
     b) 3
     c) 7
     d) 9
hard-questions_key3:
Twice a number equals 5 times the same number plus 18. Which is the number?

     a) -3
     b) -4
     c) -9
     d) -6
